import React from "react"; import "../assets/styles/Product.css"; import spotlightImage from "../assets/images/product/product1.svg"; import roverLogo from "../assets/images/product/rover_logo.svg"; class Product extends React.Component { render() { return (
| It's your world, ride it!

CAD 2,895

Take on long distance and uphill adventures like a pro. With our innovative Torque Sensor System, you can make any challenging environment seems effortless.

X
Y
Add to cart
Check out now
); } } export default Product;
